lead_paragraph: EVERYONE'S tired of hearing how tired working mothers are all the time, so I won't say how tired I was when I set out for a three-day respite at two resorts on the California coast in November. Let's just say I was not at all sorry to abandon fourth-grade homework, a second-grade class dinner, the subway, my office, two weekend soccer games and the cat box. I was sorry only to leave the other working parent in our household behind. But not as sorry as he was. I needed a psychic tuneup, and a change of scenery. I needed to see the cliffs of Big Sur. Preferably from a spa.
abstract: Jan Benzel article describes her stays at Post Ranch Inn and Bernardus Lodge, resort spas on California coast near Big Sur; photos; map (M)

headline.main: Warm Jade Stones Between Your Toes
